verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> in the plains<WH6160> of Moab<WH4124> by the Jordan<WH3383> at Jericho,<WH3405> saying,<WH559>

"Command<WH6680> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> that they give<WH5414> to the Levites<WH3881> of the inheritance<WH5159> of their possession<WH272> cities<WH5892> to dwell in;<WH3427> and you shall give<WH5414> suburbs<WH4054> for the cities<WH5892> around<WH5439> them to the Levites.<WH3881>
The cities<WH5892> shall they have to dwell in;<WH3427> and their suburbs<WH4054> shall be for their livestock,<WH929> and for their substance,<WH7399> and for all their animals.<WH2416>

"The suburbs<WH4054> of the cities,<WH5892> which you shall give<WH5414> to the Levites,<WH3881> shall be from the wall<WH7023> of the city<WH5892> and outward<WH2351> one thousand<WH505> cubits<WH520> around it.<WH5439>

You shall measure<WH4058> outside<WH2351> of the city<WH5892> for the east<WH6924> side<WH6285> two thousand<WH505> cubits,<WH520> and for the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> two thousand<WH505> cubits,<WH520> and for the west<WH3220> side<WH6285> two thousand<WH505> cubits,<WH520> and for the north<WH6828> side<WH6285> two thousand<WH505> cubits,<WH520> the city<WH5892> being in the midst.<WH8432> This shall be to them the suburbs<WH4054> of the cities.<WH5892>

"The cities<WH5892> which you shall give<WH5414> to the Levites,<WH3881> they shall be the six<WH8337> cities<WH5892> of refuge,<WH4733> which you shall give<WH5414> for the manslayer<WH7523> to flee<WH5127> to:<WH5414> and besides them you shall give forty<WH705> - two<WH8147> cities.<WH5892>
All the cities<WH5892> which you shall give<WH5414> to the Levites<WH3881> shall be forty<WH705> - eight<WH8083> cities<WH5892> together with their suburbs.<WH4054>

Concerning the cities<WH5892> which you shall give<WH5414> of the possession<WH272> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> from the many<WH7227> you shall take many;<WH7227> and from the few<WH4592> you shall take few:<WH4592> everyone<WH376> according<WH6310> to his inheritance<WH5159> which he inherits<WH5157> shall give<WH5414> of his cities<WH5892> to the Levites.<WH3881>"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and tell<WH559> them,<WH5674> 'When you pass over the Jordan<WH3383> into the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667>

then you shall appoint<WH7136> you cities<WH5892> to be cities<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for you,<WH7523> that the manslayer who kills<WH5221> any person<WH5315> unwittingly<WH7684> may flee there.<WH5127>

The cities<WH5892> shall be to you for refuge<WH4733> from the avenger,<WH1350> that the manslayer<WH7523> not die,<WH4191> until he stands<WH5975> before<WH6440> the congregation<WH5712> for judgment.<WH4941>
The cities<WH5892> which you shall give<WH5414> shall be for you six<WH8337> cities<WH5892> of refuge.<WH4733>

You shall give<WH5414> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan,<WH3383> and you shall give<WH5414> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> in the land<WH776> of Canaan;<WH3667> they shall be cities<WH5892> of refuge.<WH4733>

For the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and for the stranger<WH1616> and for the foreigner<WH1616> living among<WH8432> them,<WH8337> shall these six cities<WH5892> be for refuge;<WH4733> that everyone who kills<WH5221> any person<WH5315> unwittingly<WH7684> may flee there.<WH5127>
<WH5221>"'But if he struck him with an instrument<WH3627> of iron,<WH1270> so that he died,<WH4191> he is a murderer:<WH7523> the murderer<WH7523> shall surely<WH4191> be put to death.<WH4191>

If he struck<WH5221> him with a stone<WH68> in the hand,<WH3027> by which a man may die,<WH4191> and he died,<WH4191> he is a murderer:<WH7523> the murderer<WH7523> shall surely<WH4191> be put to death.<WH4191>

Or if he struck<WH5221> him with a weapon<WH3627> of wood<WH6086> in the hand,<WH3027> by which a man may die,<WH4191> and he died,<WH4191> he is a murderer:<WH7523> the murderer<WH7523> shall surely<WH4191> be put to death.<WH4191>
The avenger of blood<WH1818> shall himself put the murderer<WH7523> to death:<WH4191> when he<WH1931> meets<WH6293> him,<WH1931> he shall put him to death.<WH4191>
If he thrust<WH1920> him of hatred,<WH8135> or hurled<WH7993> at him,<WH6660> lying in wait, so that he died,<WH4191>

or in enmity<WH342> struck<WH5221> him with his hand,<WH3027> so that he died;<WH4191> he who struck<WH5221> him shall surely<WH4191> be put to death;<WH4191> he is a murderer:<WH7523> the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818> shall put the murderer<WH7523> to death,<WH4191> when he meets him.<WH6293>
<WH1920>"'But if he thrust him suddenly<WH6621> without<WH3808> enmity,<WH342> or hurled<WH7993> on him anything<WH3627> without lying in wait,<WH6660>

or with any stone,<WH68> by which a man may die,<WH4191> not<WH3808> seeing<WH7200> him,<WH5307> and cast it on him,<WH4191> so that he died, and he was not his enemy,<WH341> neither sought<WH1245> his harm;<WH7451>
then the congregation<WH5712> shall judge<WH8199> between the striker<WH5221> and the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818> according to these ordinances;<WH4941>

and the congregation<WH5712> shall deliver<WH5337> the manslayer<WH7523> out of the hand<WH3027> of the avenger<WH1350> of blood,<WH1818> and the congregation<WH5712> shall restore<WH7725> him to his city<WH5892> of refuge,<WH4733> where he was fled:<WH5127> and he shall dwell<WH3427> therein until the death<WH4194> of the high<WH1419> priest,<WH3548> who was anointed<WH4886> with the holy<WH6944> oil.<WH8081>
<WH7523>"'But if the manslayer shall at any time<WH3318> go<WH3318> beyond the border<WH1366> of his city<WH5892> of refuge,<WH4733> where he flees,<WH5127>

and the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818> find<WH4672> him outside<WH2351> of the border<WH1366> of his city<WH5892> of refuge,<WH4733> and the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818> kill<WH7523> the manslayer;<WH7523> he shall not be guilty of blood,<WH1818>

because he should have remained<WH3427> in his city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> until the death<WH4194> of the high<WH1419> priest:<WH3548> but after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548> the manslayer<WH7523> shall return<WH7725> into the land<WH776> of his possession.<WH272>
<WH2708>"'These things shall be for a statute and ordinance<WH4941> to you throughout your generations<WH1755> in all your dwellings.<WH4186>

<WH5221>"'Whoever kills any person,<WH5315> the murderer<WH7523> shall be slain<WH7523> at the mouth<WH6310> of witnesses:<WH5707> but one<WH259> witness<WH5707> shall not testify<WH6030> against any person<WH5315> that he die.<WH4191>
<WH3947>"'Moreover you shall take no ransom<WH3724> for the life<WH5315> of a murderer<WH7523> who is guilty<WH7563> of death;<WH4191> but he shall surely<WH4191> be put to death.<WH4191>

<WH3947>"'You shall take no ransom<WH3724> for him who is fled<WH5127> to his city<WH5892> of refuge,<WH4733> that he may come again<WH7725> to dwell<WH3427> in the land,<WH776> until the death<WH4194> of the priest.<WH3548>

<WH2610>"'So you shall not pollute the land<WH776> in which you are:<WH1818> for blood, it pollutes<WH2610> the land;<WH776> and no expiation<WH3722> can be made for the land<WH776> for the blood<WH1818> that is shed<WH8210> therein,<WH1818> but by the blood of him who shed it.<WH8210>

You shall not defile<WH2930> the land<WH776> which you inhabit,<WH3427> in the midst of which<WH8432> I dwell:<WH7931> for I,<WH3068> Yahweh, dwell<WH7931> in<WH8432> the midst of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>'"
